DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of BI 135585 XX following single dose administration.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Explore Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of a Single Rising Dose of BI 135585 XX
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects 2. overweight or obese Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
